text: Thomas G. O'Donnell (30 August 1926 – 8 October 2020) was an Irish Fine Gael politician. He was born in Charleville, County Cork. O'Donnell was Minister for the Gaeltacht from 1973 to 1977. He was a Teachta Dála (TD) for the Limerick East from 1961 to 1987. He also was a Member of the European Parliament (MEP) for the Munster constituency from 1979 to 1984. O'Donnell died on 8 October 2020 in County Limerick at the age of 94. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2020 deaths Category:MEPs for Ireland Category:Politicians from County Cork
title: Tom O'Donnell
